data.title: Find next string after specific substring with RegExp
data.meta_description:
I parse the PDF file from which I want to extract the name and surname from the table. I managed to get the text to this form. Now I would like to receive information from this.
Name1 • • • • • Sur...
data.text:
I parse the PDF file from which I want to extract the name and surname from the table. I managed to get the text to this form. Now I would like to receive information from this.

Name1 • • • • • Surname1 Name2 • • • • • Surname2

I was thinking about putting a separator after the surname to make it look something like this

Name1 • • • • • Surname1 SEPARATOR Name2 • • • • • Surname2 SEPARATOR

I have absolutely no idea how to find the surname using regexp. The only thing that comes to my mind is to find the string '• • • • •' and then put a sperator after the next word (surname)

I'm not looking for a ready-made solution, but hints on how to do it. I will be grateful
